abstract: Joseph Patterson of South Dakota is convicted of 2013 killing of his girlfriend's 2-year-old son Tyrese Robert Ruffin, whose father is Minnesota Vikings running back Adrian Peterson; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: A South Dakota jury convicted a man of second-degree murder and other charges in the death of the 2-year-old son of Minnesota Vikings running back Adrian Peterson.

headline.main: Conviction in Death of Peterson’s Son
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Pro Football; Conviction in Death

snippet: A South Dakota jury convicted a man of second-degree murder and other charges in the death of the 2-year-old son of Minnesota Vikings running back Adrian Peterson.
